name: Duolingo True Dark
description: A more balanced dark version of Duolingo
obsoletion_message: Since Stylish is spying on you https://forum.duolingo.com/comment/27870688 you might want to uninstall it.
additional_info:
If there's anything I missed, please post a comment about it (be clear).

July 28th 2018:
Changed some icons to a darker version (like in the extension version of the script)

July 15th 2018:
Complete overhaul

discussions.name: Words page needs a little update.
discussion page sometimes loads with bright background
Good, but already used words, don't change color once you click on them.
